A4.text: Mikel scored a rare goal against Sporting CP on 10 December in a 3–1 victory at Stamford Bridge in the 2014–15 Champions League.

A5.text: He scored his second goal of the season in Chelsea's third round tie with Derby County on 5 January 2014, heading in the opening goal in the 2–0 win against Derby County.
